target: Booking was unsuccessful. May I try another day or a shorter stay?
context: <user> I am planning a visit to Cambridge soon and want to visit a specific attraction people are talking about. Have you heard of the funky fun house? <system> Yes I have. It is an entertainment venue in the east area, would you like more information on them? <user> Can you give me their phone number please? <system> That number is 01223304705. <user> Thanks. I also need a place to stay. I would like a hotel with a 4 star rating. <system> Certainly, would you like a cheap hotel? Or expensive? <user> I dont care about the price point. But, I do want it to be on the west side of town. <system> I recommend the Cambridge Belfry. It's a cheap hotel on the west side. Would you like me to book you a room?<user> Yes please, I need to book it for 3 nights for 5 people starting Sunday. <system>
